HotpotCommonRules.GameplayExplain: Any match of 3 or more symbols anywhere in the reel area will result in a win and will be paid out according to the "Paytable".
HotpotCommonRules.PaidExplain: Multiple matches can be paid out in 1 spin.
HotpotCommonRules.ChilliSymbolExplain: A Chilli symbol may appear together with any other symbol on the reels.
HotpotCommonRules.JackpotBarExplain: A Jackpot Bar is placed above the reels which may award one of the 3 Jackpot prizes: Smokin' Hot, Flamin' Hot or Ultra Hot.
HotpotCommonRules.ChilliCollectExplain: When one or more Chilli symbols appear on reels, the Chilli symbols are collected in the Jackpot Bar.
HotpotCommonRules.JackpotPrizeExplain: Jackpot prize is awarded based on the number of Chilli symbols collected at the end of the spin.
HotpotCommonRules.UltraHotJackpotExplain: If 9 Chilli symbols are collected, Ultra Hot Jackpot is awarded.
HotpotCommonRules.FlaminHotJackpotExplain: If 6 or more (and less than 9) Chilli symbols are collected, Flamin' Hot Jackpot is awarded.
HotpotCommonRules.SmokinHotJackpotExplain: If 4 or more (and less than 6) Chilli symbols are collected, Smokin' Hot Jackpot is awarded.
HotpotCommonRules.JackpotBarResetExplain: The Jackpot Bar will reset to zero at the start of every spin.

HotpotRules.Rule1: Hotpot is a 9 single-reels video slot featuring match-3 gameplay and 3 jackpot prizes.

Rule2.value: The game is played with 10 base bet (fixed), bet level of %{minBetMtp} to %{maxBetMtp} and bet size of %{minChip} to %{maxChip}.
Rule2.comment: Both %{minChip} and %{maxChip} will be replaced with game available chip size. Both %{minBetMtp} and %{maxBetMtp} will be replaced by multiplier, do not translate.
Rule2.example: The game is played with a fixed bet of 10, bet level of 1 to 10 and bet size of 0.01 to 5.

HotpotRules.Rule9: A match win in cash is equal to the value shown in the "Paytable" multiplied by the bet size and bet level.
HotpotRules.Jackpot2: A percentage of the player's bet is added to the jackpot prizes on every spin.
HotpotRules.Jackpot8: After a Jackpot prize is paid out (if any), that Jackpot prize's value will reset to the base value.
HotpotRules.Jackpot9: Only 1 Jackpot prize can be won in a spin.
HotpotRules.Jackpot11: Each Jackpot's base value will change according to the current Bet Amount.
